title: Welcome Mat Greeting
content:
Welcome!

It looks like you're shopping from {{widget type="FedEx\CrossBorder\Block\Widget\WelcomeMat\SelectedCountry"}}. We're displaying prices in {{widget type="FedEx\CrossBorder\Block\Widget\WelcomeMat\SelectedCurrency"}} to match your location. To confirm this, click the "Save Changes" button below.
 
You can also choose to continue as a US shopper.

{{widget type="FedEx\CrossBorder\Block\Widget\WelcomeMat\SelectorContainer" show_country="1" country_title="Select your Country/Territory" show_currency="1" currency_title="Select your Currency" save_button_title="UPDATE PREFERENCES" show_default="1" default_type="button" default_title="Continue as a US user"}}
